name: stationery
description: Compose letters at the command line.

scripts.start: node ./bin/index.js Beatrice, Then is courtesy a turncoat. --yours, Benedick
scripts.formal: node ./bin/index.js Beatrice, Then is courtesy a turncoat. --yours, Benedick --tpl ./formal.mustache
scripts.sig: node ./bin/index.js config, --sig detective. Entrepreneur. Smart guy.
scripts.patch-release: npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Graham Marlow
